Title: Most beautiful wedding day!
Text: Gran Villa Rosa! What can I say, what a fabulous venue! I spent three days there for my sister wedding. It was the best three days of my life. Thank you to all the staff that made us all feel so welcome and what you did for us. Truly nothing could have been better, it was all perfect.  Food was amazing, Thank you so much! Hopefully we will be back in the future to see you all. Truly fabulous! X
